1: <pb/><e>Jun b'it tzon̈ c'ayb'ani. Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Te vach' yic eb' tz'ac'chaj lajvoc smul, succhaj sat schucal eb'.</t>
2: <t>Te vach' yic eb' syal Jehová to man̈xalaj smul eb' d'a yichan̈, aton eb' maxtzac c'ub'anel smul d'a eb' yetanimail.</t>
3: <t>Ayic manto valq'uetalaj in mul, yelxo val ijan ix lajviel in nivanil ix vab'i, yujto ix in te c'acvi.</t>
4: <t>Ach in Diosal, c'ual d'ac'val yelc'olal ix ac'och in yaelal. Icha val an̈ taquin̈ an̈c'ultac stacjiel yuj varesma, ichinta ix vab'i.</t>
5: <t>Ichato chi' ix valanq'ueta in mul chi' d'ayach, malaj tas ix in c'ub'ejeli. Ix el val d'a in c'ool valan in b'a d'ayach. A achxo Mamin Jehová ix in ac' nivanc'olal.</t>
6: <t>Yuj val chi' jun, yalocab' sb'a eb' tzach c'anab'ajani yacb'an tzato yala'. Vach'chom sja yaelal icha a' eluma', palta max yamchajlaj eb' yuuj.</t>
7: <t>A ach ay ach och ven̈uloc, a ach ol in a colel d'a yaelal. Tzach in b'itej yujto ix in a coleli.</t>
8: <t>Ix yal Jehová d'ayin: Ol ach in c'ayb'ej d'a tas ol a c'ulej. Ol in ch'ox d'ayach b'ajtil ol ach b'atoc, ol ach in tan̈vej.</t>
9: <t>Man̈ utej a b'a icha noc' chej ma icha junoc noc' mula, a juntzan̈ noc' chi' max nachajel-laj yuj noc'. Yovalil syamchajoch vaan noc' yed' q'uen freno. Tato man̈ ichocta tz'utaj noc', max sc'anab'ajejlaj noc', xchi Jehová d'ayin.</t>
10: <t>A eb' chuc sb'eyb'al, man̈ jantacoc yaelal ol cot d'a yib'an̈ eb'. Axo eb' ayoch Dios yipoc sc'ool, a svach'c'olal Dios chi' ol moyanq'ue eb'.</t>
11: <t>Aq'uec tzalajb'oc e c'ool d'a Jehová ex anima vach' e pensar. B'itanan̈ec d'a tzalajc'olal e masanil ex ayex och d'a stojolal.</t>
